block.p: Frances Randall Hunt, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. David Pratt Hunt of Washington, was married yesterday to Fletcher Maddox Jewett, a son of Dr. Leslie S. Jewett of Washington and Eugene A. Jewett of Alexandria, Va. The Rev. James L. Ulrich performed the Episcopal ceremony at Little Moose Lodge on Little Moose Lake in Old Forge, N.Y.

Mrs. Jewett, 31, is known as Francesca. She is a merchandise assistant at Trout Unlimited, a conservation group in Arlington, Va. She graduated from the Cordon Bleu school in Paris. Her father is a retired senior official at the Central Intelligence Agency. Her mother, Randall Hunt, is an independent fine-arts appraiser.

Mr. Jewett, 33, is an accountant in Washington. He graduated from the University of Maryland. His mother, who retired as the director of the Medlantic Institute, the physician education unit of Medlantic Health Care, a hospital company in Washington, is a jewelry designer and distributor in Washington. His father is a vice president for investments in the Washington office of Advest, a securities and insurance brokerage company.
